longTitle.p: COUNCIL DECISION (EU, Euratom) 2020/233of 17 February 2020appointing a member, proposed by the French Republic, of the European Economic and Social Committee

formula.name: actingEntity
formula.p: THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

citation.p: Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 302 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 106a thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the French Government,
Having regard to the opinion of the European Commission,

recital.p:
On 18 September 2015 and 1 October 2015, the Council adopted Decisions (EU, Euratom) 2015/1600
Council Decision (EU, Euratom) 2015/1600 of 18 September 2015 appointing the members of the European Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 2015 to 20 September 2020 (OJ L 248, 24.9.2015, p. 53). and (EU, Euratom) 2015/1790
Council Decision (EU, Euratom) 2015/1790 of 1 October 2015 appointing the members of the European Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 2015 to 20 September 2020 (OJ L 260, 7.10.2015, p. 23). appointing the members of the European Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 2015 to 20 September 2020.
A member's seat on the European Economic and Social Committee has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Christophe HILLAIRET,

content.p: Mr Maximin CHARPENTIER, Membre du bureau de l'Assembl√©e permanente des chambres d'agriculture, is hereby appointed as a member of the European Economic and Social Committee for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 20 September 2020.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
